name: Hide Out
description:
Hello there!
How would you like to play a little game of hide and seek?
But we play it with a little twist. Only one person hides and the others are the seekers. The hider can - while unnoticed - tap a seeker, so that he/she may no longer search.
Now let's find out, how many seeker you can find before they find you - shall we?

(BASED ON THE FRANKEN GAME JAM 2020; THEME: ANTICIPATION)


NOTE: Since it was created during this weekend, there's still some work left to do. So stay tuned. We may have planned a thing or two.

CREDITS:
